tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE automatic_bill_payments (
  bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bill_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  bill_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  payment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  payment_method VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  reminder_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE automatic_bill_payments (
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    bill_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    bill_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    payment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, bill_name)
);
CREATE TABLE payment_reminders (
    reminder_id UUID NOT NULL,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    bill_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    reminder_date DATE NOT NULL,
    reminder_message TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (reminder_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id, bill_name) REFERENCES automatic_bill_payments(user_id, bill_name)
);

CREATE TABLE bills (
    bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    bill_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    due_date DATE NOT NULL,
    reminder_sent BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE payment_history (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_id INT,
    payment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    amount_paid DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    payment_method VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE billers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    payment_method VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE bills (
    bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    biller_id INT NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    due_date DATE NOT NULL,
    paid BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
    FOREIGN KEY (biller_id) REFERENCES billers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE payment_history (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_id INT NOT NULL,
    payment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    amount_paid DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (bill_id) REFERENCES bills(bill_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
    reminder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_id INT NOT NULL,
    reminder_date DATE NOT NULL,
    reminder_message TEXT NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active',
    FOREIGN KEY (bill_id) REFERENCES bills(bill_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    address TEXT
);
